source_sentence: 彼等一切諸佛世尊而讚嘆言：『善哉！
translation: All of those buddhas and world-honored ones praised them, saying, 'Good!'

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 善丈夫！
translation: Good man!

source_sentence: 汝今乃說是甚深陀羅尼乎。
translation: Are you now saying this is a profound dhāraṇī?

source_sentence: 若有讀誦、受持此陀羅尼者，常廣思惟。
translation: If someone recites or memorizes this dhāraṇī, they'll always contemplate it extensively.

source_sentence: 彼族姓子，當得此等諸佛世尊恒常滿足彼之所願。』
translation: That clansman will attain these buddhas and world-honored ones who always fulfill their wishes.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，香明如來以其舌根，遍覆三千大千世界，然後告彼七十七那由他菩薩言：『若有良家子、良家女，
translation: “At that time the Tathāgata Sugandhakūṭa covered the great chiliocosm with his tongue, and then addressed those bodhisattvas as many as seventy-seven nayutas, saying:

source_sentence: 受持此陀羅尼章句，若讀、若誦，隨力當作供養，彼為此等諸佛世尊，
translation: “Furthermore, these buddhas and world-honored ones who preserve this chapter of the dhāraṇī, recite it or recite it, and make offerings to it as much as they can.

source_sentence: 所有心願皆悉滿足。』
translation: All of his mind's wishes will be fulfilled.'

source_sentence: 爾時，教發菩薩摩訶薩白香光如來，作如是言：『世尊！
translation: It was then that the Tathāgata taught the arousal of the white fragrant light of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva to say, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼等云何而作供養，供養彼等諸佛如來？』
translation: How did they make offerings to those buddha-tathāgatas and make offerings to them?'

source_sentence: 作是語已，世尊告彼教發菩薩，作如是言：『良家姓子，若有初發心行菩薩初發業者，
translation: Having said this, the World-honored One told those bodhisattvas who had been instructed to give rise to enlightenment, saying:

source_sentence: 又欲得滿一切願者，彼於晨朝時，以瞿摩塗地，隨力香花而供養已，去離世談，
translation: Also, if someone wants to fulfill all their vows, they should rub the earth with ghee in the morning and offer them flowers of fragrance as much as they can, leaving worldly talk.

source_sentence: 晝三遍、夜三遍，誦彼諸佛如來名號及此陀羅尼，而彼即得現見諸法，
translation: He recites the names of those buddha-tathāgatas and these dhāraṇīs three times during the day and three times during the night, and they instantly attain insight into all teachings.

source_sentence: 漸得滅除一切業障，以諸如來真實持故。』
translation: Gradually, he'll be able to remove all the karmic hindrances because the tathāgatas truly maintain them.'

source_sentence: 於晨朝時，常當精勤專念彼等如來名號，而彼人輩，四萬劫常識宿命，
translation: In the morning, they should always diligently concentrate on remembering the names of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 亦不忘失菩提之心。
translation: They also don't forget the mind of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「南無一切趣清淨王如來「多緻他(一)　輸達儞輸達儞(儞字悉年隸反)　薩婆波頗毘輸達儞輸悌　毘輸悌　薩婆達摩毘輸悌　莎呵「若有善男子、善女人，

source_sentence: 常能受持此如來名號，精勤憶念，不忘失者，即得現見一切諸法，盡諸業障及盡諸惡，
translation: Those who are always able to retain the name of this buddha and diligently remember it without forgetting it will attain a clear vision of all things, annihilating all karmic hindrances and all evils.

source_sentence: 以佛真實住持力故，當於十四俱致世中，常憶宿命，乃至菩提，善根亦不窮盡。
translation: Because of the power of the Buddha's true abiding support, he'll always remember past lives in 14 koṭis of worlds, up to enlightenment, and his good roots won't be exhausted.

source_sentence: 「南無清淨眼如來「多緻他(一)　斫芻斫芻(二)　若那斫芻(三)　莎呵(諸莎則長聲，
translation: 「南無清淨眼如來如來「多緻他(一) 芻芻(二) 若那芻(三) 莎呵(諸莎則長聲,

source_sentence: 呵則去聲)「若善男子、善女人，持此如來之名號者，彼於世間當作眼目，
translation: If good men and good women hold the names of these tathāgatas, they'll become eyes and eyes in the world,

source_sentence: 常能憶持四十俱致宿命之事，乃至道場，善根不盡。
translation: He's always able to remember the events of forty koṭis of past lives, even up to the site of enlightenment, and his good roots don't run out.

source_sentence: 「南無香象光王如來「多緻他(一)　揭誓揭誓(二)　揭誓延(以佃反)悌唎(三)　莎呵」「爾時，

source_sentence: 勝聚菩薩白佛言：『若有善男子、善女人，持此香象光王如來名號者，
translation: The Vaiśeṣika bodhisattva said to the Buddha, “If there are any sons or daughters of a virtuous family holding the names of these Tathāgatas called Gandhapradīpa and Sanghapradīpa,

source_sentence: 彼於十三俱致歲中，身出香氣不曾休息，亦不廢忘菩提之心。』
translation: For 13 koṭi years, his body emits a fragrance that doesn't cease, and he doesn't forget the mind of enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 「南無花相如來「多緻他(一)　布澁閉(二)　布澁閉(三)　蘇(引)布澁閉(四)　莎呵「此陀羅尼，

source_sentence: 多有功能。
translation: Most of them have function.

source_sentence: 以陀羅尼呪華二十一遍，如所備具，向如來塔中散之，彼人所有心願皆得滿足，
translation: With the flowers of dhāraṇī spells twenty-one times, he scattered them toward the Tathāgata’s stupa exactly as they had been prepared and fulfilled all his wishes.

source_sentence: 復盡一切業障。
translation: It also ends all the karmic hindrances.

source_sentence: 「南無治地王如來「多著他(一)　達唎達唎(二)　達囉尼盤地(三)　莎呵「若有人持此如來名字，
translation: 「南無治地王如來如來「多著他(一) 達達(二) 達囉尼盤地(三) 莎呵若有人持此如來名字,

source_sentence: 及此陀羅尼章句，彼人當滿一切心願。
translation: And these dhāraṇī chapters and phrases, that person will fulfill all their mental vows.

source_sentence: 誦此呪一百八遍，即當一切諸地方所，皆成結界，隨得供具供養如來，
translation: Recite this dhāraṇī one hundred and eight times, and all the places where it is recited will form boundary formations to make offerings to the Tathāgata as he obtains them.

source_sentence: 即滿一切所有諸願。
translation: It's the fulfillment of all the vows that exist.

source_sentence: 「有佛名日月燈明，　　現在說法人師子，
translation: “There is a buddha named Candracchattra, the light of the sun and moon.

source_sentence: 若能持是佛名號，　　更不生諸惡趣中。
translation: If they can preserve this name of the Buddha, They won’t be born again in evil destinies.

source_sentence: 有佛名日月燈光，　　現在說法人師子，
translation: There is a buddha named Candracchattra, the lamp of the sun and moon. He is now the lion who teaches the Dharma.

source_sentence: 若能持彼佛名號，　　當得總持能巧知。
translation: If someone can maintain the names of those buddhas, they'll attain the mastery of universal maintenance and skillful knowing.

source_sentence: 有佛名曰電燈明，　　現在說法人師子，
translation: There was a buddha named Light of the Lamp of electricity, the lion who teaches the Dharma in this world.

source_sentence: 若能持彼佛名者，　　不曾生於惡趣中。
translation: If someone can preserve the name of that Buddha, they won't be born in a bad destiny.

source_sentence: 有佛名曰最勝燈，　　現在說法人師子，
